MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Dumbiedykes Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.43am. Our engineers have arrived on site at Dumbiedykes Road substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.25am on Tuesday 17th November 2020.
